data.lyric:
[ti:Valuable Pain (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Realer (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Valuable Pain (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:12.70]Yeah yeah
[00:15.04]
[00:22.22]I'ma say I'm sorry for
[00:23.00]All of the s**t that I had did
[00:24.52]And I'm thankful for that s**t
[00:25.80]That you had done while we was kids
[00:27.20]Been puttin' my soul up in
[00:28.26]This music and I'm hopin' that you hear
[00:30.06]I'm steady screamin' 4KTrey
[00:31.11]I'm tryna split a n***a wig
[00:32.83]All these b***hes tellin' lies but
[00:35.09]If you know me don't think twice
[00:36.55]Instead of doin' what's wrong
[00:37.42]Lil' b***h you do what's right
[00:38.63]I feel like f**k live in disguise
[00:40.35]I showed my wrong don't hide my right
[00:42.16]You saw me down you tryna show off for the hype
[00:44.05]Don't do that lame a*s s**t
[00:45.06]I f**k with you but you don't f**k with me
[00:47.30]But somehow we still find a way to text
[00:49.23]Each other 'fore we go to sleep
[00:50.78]I don't know s**t about no Jodeci
[00:53.16]But you gon' suck me to his music
[00:54.76]While I sit back thinkin'
[00:55.75]Smoke my w**d
[00:56.76]These killers 'round me they look up to me
[00:58.75]I got them bodies I won't say no names
[01:00.76]I hope it don't catch up to me
[01:02.25]You really mad that you can't f**k with me
[01:04.46]You X'd me out you ain't have to f**k with me
[01:06.46]N***a why you came then f**k with me
[01:07.76]Told you I'd do anything for you
[01:09.77]I just don't know what they want
[01:12.56]And I wasn't frontin' when I told you I love you
[01:15.22]Girl you the only one that I want
[01:18.12]These n***as be cappin' we pull up slangin' that static
[01:20.48]Don't do no talkin' have yo' s**t together when we come
[01:23.70]I got too many brothers that done died by the gun
[01:26.37]I murder from the heart so you can say what you want
[01:29.63]They say she f**k with that n***a I wish I caught her
[01:32.50]Smokin' on this Cherry Pie f**kin' yo' favorite athlete daughter
[01:35.57]They say that n***a that been trippin' put that b***h in order
[01:38.45]I just came through swervin' n***a in a Hellcat Charger
[01:41.61]Jigga was swervin' behind me turn up in a Benz
[01:43.29]Studio session go in
[01:44.27]Tell them lil' n***as I said for them not to walk in
[01:46.32]Up with the Glock let off 10
[01:47.40]Poppin' them bottles of lean with Instagram models
[01:48.92]Stayin' at the Drury Inn
[01:50.24]I know she don't drink she said that she drink
[01:51.89]I let her just sip what she can can
[01:53.70]I say Lil' Ben you hear them talkin' he say uh-uh
[01:56.52]I hit the gas and then we turn up on they a*s
[01:59.58]Ran up my money and they hear it when I talk now
[02:02.22]Them b***hes know it's over with they in my past
[02:05.10]'Cause you left ice on my heart
[02:06.67]And I could say that ho wasn't wrong
[02:07.97]You wasn't right from the start
[02:09.42]I wish you could exchange my time
[02:11.01]For that watch that I bought
[02:12.20]Really was tryna make you mad
[02:13.66]And I don't know what I had thought
[02:15.13]Told you I'd do anything for you
[02:17.42]I just don't know what they want
[02:20.19]And I wasn't frontin' when I told you I love you
[02:23.13]Girl you the only one that I want
[02:25.96]These n***as be cappin' we pull up slangin' that static
[02:28.42]Don't do no talkin' have yo' s**t together when we come
[02:31.41]I got too many brothers that done died by the gun
[02:34.28]I murder from the heart so you can say what you want
data.trans:
[ti:Valuable Pain (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Realer (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.70]//
[00:15.04]
[00:22.22]我想说 我很抱歉
[00:23.00]做了这么多坏事
[00:24.52]也谢谢你
[00:25.80]小时候为我做的一切
[00:27.20]我把自己的真心都倾注在音乐里了
[00:28.26]希望你能听见
[00:30.06]我在大声呐喊
[00:31.11]我要摘下那些家伙的面具
[00:32.83]所有人都在撒谎
[00:35.09]但如果你了解我 那就不用怀疑我
[00:36.55]不要犯错
[00:37.42]臭娘们 做正确的事
[00:38.63]我不想戴着面具活着
[00:40.35]不管是对是错 我都不掩饰自己
[00:42.16]你看到我落魄了 就幸灾乐祸 想跟我炫耀你自己
[00:44.05]别做那么恶心的事好吗
[00:45.06]我可以惹你 但你不能惹我
[00:47.30]但我们最终还是会相互发个短信
[00:49.23]之后才睡觉
[00:50.78]Jodeci什么的 我根本不知道
[00:53.16]但你偏要我听他的音乐
[00:54.76]我坐在那里思考人生
[00:55.75]抽着烟
[00:56.76]我身边的杀手都敬仰我
[00:58.75]我不会背叛他们 一个字都不会透露
[01:00.76]我希望自己永远不忘初心
[01:02.25]不能随便惹我 你恨得牙痒痒
[01:04.46]你把我除掉 就不用跟我扯上关系了
[01:06.46]哥们 你为什么要来惹我
[01:07.76]我说过 我愿为你做任何事情
[01:09.77]我只是不懂他们想要什么
[01:12.56]我说爱你的时候 没有撒谎
[01:15.22]姑娘 我的心里只有你
[01:18.12]这些家伙谎话连篇
[01:20.48]我们不说废话 直接帮你把事情摆平
[01:23.70]我有太多兄弟死于枪口之下
[01:26.37]我是真心实意的 所以尽管告诉我你想要什么
[01:29.63]他们说她和那个男人有一腿 真希望我把她抓个现行
[01:32.50]吃着樱桃饼 和你最爱的运动员的女儿亲热
[01:35.57]他们说那个家伙脑子进水了 必须得教育一下那个娘们
[01:38.45]我刚开着一辆道奇地狱猫来到这里
[01:41.61]兄弟们开车跟在我身后 都是开的奔驰
[01:43.29]开始录歌了 快进去
[01:44.27]告诉那些家伙 我不允许他们加入
[01:46.32]拿着Glock手枪 开十枪
[01:47.40]和网红模特一起喝紫水
[01:48.92]一起待在Drury酒店
[01:50.24]我知道她不喝酒 她却说她会喝
[01:51.89]我让她量力而行 适可而止
[01:53.70]我说 Ben 你听到他们说什么了吗 他说 这个嘛
[01:56.52]我抽一口叶子 然后我们去找他们
[01:59.58]我花光了钱 现在我说话的时候他们都洗耳恭听
[02:02.22]这些娘们知道一切都过去了 我已经释怀了
[02:05.10]因为你让我无比心寒
[02:06.67]我可以说 那个女人没有错
[02:07.97]而你也没有理 一开始就是如此
[02:09.42]我希望给你买的那块表
[02:11.01]能换回我的时间
[02:12.20]当时真的想要得到你
[02:13.66]我不知道自己当时在想什么
[02:15.13]我说过 我愿为你做任何事情
[02:17.42]我只是不懂他们想要什么
[02:20.19]我说爱你的时候 没有撒谎
[02:23.13]姑娘 我的心里只有你
[02:25.96]这些家伙谎话连篇
[02:28.42]我们不说废话 直接帮你把事情摆平
[02:31.41]我有太多兄弟死于枪口之下
[02:34.28]我是真心实意的 所以尽管告诉我你想要什么
